annotations.description: In the 1947 Frank Capra Christmas Classic Clarence orders a Flaming Rum Punch, but he never gets it, but what if he did? What drink would it be? Flaming Rum ...
annotations.title: Flaming Drink from It's a Wonderful Life | How to Drink

textContent:
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Smith + Cross Rum
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Wray & Nephew Overproof
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Oleo Saccharum with lemon juice
4 oz. -or- 120 ml. Hot Water

Set rums on fire in glass
Add cinnamon & Nutmeg
Pour mix of oleo saccharum and water in to extinguish flames
Garnish with Lemon Twist and Cinnamon Stick

title: Flaming Rum Punch
